title: Mechanisms of Insect Nutritional Homeostasis workshop
impactText: this was a workshop on Insect Nutritional Homeostasis that took place at the University of Bonn in 2012. Healthcare Cultural,Societal,Economic,Policy & public services
findingsText:
This was a workshop on the insect nutrition. It was an opportunity for leading researchers in this field to share data and information and ideas. 

A special issue of the Journal of Insect Physiology was published that reported papers from the participants. Researchers at all stages benefitted massively from attending the conference. It has accelerated research in this area, leading to important collaborations between modellers, ecologists, physiologists, and molecular biologists working in this field. Education,Environment,Healthcare
